texts.DisplayName:Name: Name
texts.Features:RecycleStrategyDesc: This section describes how to set the resource reclamation policy for tenants after the grace period expires
texts.Features:ExpirationReminderDaysDesc: Send a reminder to the administrator when the resource has how many days left to expire
texts.Features:ExpiredRecoveryTimeDesc: If the resource expiration is not handled for a long time, tenant resources will be reclaimed
